turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: The pain does change when I stand up. When I stand up, it feels less of a sharp pain only when I'm sitting down.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Okay, that's good to know. It could be related to your posture while sitting. Perhaps try adjusting your chair or adding some lumbar support. Does that make any difference?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: No, I don't think so because my chair is a bit too soft.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Yes, a soft chair might not provide enough support, especially for your back. That could definitely contribute to the pain, perhaps try a firmer chair or add a cushion for better support.
